abilities.name: Regrowth
abilities.description: Heal target ally for 150 Health instantly and an additional 420 Health over 15 seconds.

abilities.name: Moonfire
abilities.description: Deal 105 damage to enemies within target area and reveals them for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Entangling Roots
abilities.description: Root enemies within the target area for 1.25 seconds, and deals 117 damage over the duration. Affected area grows over 3 seconds.

heroics.name: Tranquility
heroics.description: Heals 80 Health per second to nearby allied Heroes over 10 seconds.

heroics.name: Twilight Dream
heroics.description: After 0.5 seconds, deal 374 damage in a large area around Malfurion, Silencing enemies making them unable to use Abilities for 3 seconds.
